info.title: Posts
info.description: Use these endpoints for interacting with Blog Posts, Blog Authors, and Blog Tags
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: Retrieve all blog posts created this year as a part of a content audit.
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the blog posts API to create, manage, and publish blog posts on your website.

post.summary: Schedule a post to be published
post.description: Schedule a blog post to be published at a specified time.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the ContentScheduleRequestVNext object.

post.summary: Retrieve a batch of Blog Posts
post.description: Retrieve a batch of blog posts by ID. identified in the request body.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted blog posts Defaults to `false`.

requestBody.description: The JSON array of Blog Post ids.

post.description: Explicitly set new languages for each post in a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content).

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the SetNewLanguagePrimaryRequest object.

post.summary: Create a batch of blog posts
post.description: Create a batch of blog posts, specifying their content in the request body.

requestBody.description: The JSON array of new Blog Posts to create.

post.summary: Update a batch of Blog Posts
post.description: Update a batch of blog posts.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Posts. Defaults to `false`.

requestBody.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Posts.

get.summary: Retrieve the full draft version of the Blog Post
get.description: Retrieve the full draft version of a blog post.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve the draft of.

patch.summary: Update the draft of a post
patch.description: Partially updates the draft version of a single blog post by ID. You only need to specify the values that you want to update.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to update the draft of.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the updated Blog Post to be applied to the draft.

get.summary: Retrieve a previous version of a blog post
get.description: Retrieve a previous version of a blog post.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The ID of the version to retrieve.

post.summary: Restore a draft to a previous version
post.description: Takes a specified version of a blog post, sets it as the new draft version of the blog post.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The ID of the version to restore the blog post to.

post.description: Create a new language variation from an existing blog post

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the BlogPostLanguageCloneRequestVNext object.

get.description: Retrieve all blog posts, with paging and filtering options. This method would be useful for an integration that ingests posts and suggests edits.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return blog posts created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return blog posts created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return blog posts created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return blog posts last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return blog posts last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return blog posts last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `createdAt` (default), `name`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 20.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted blog posts. Defaults to `false`.

post.description: Create a new blog post, specifying its content in the request body.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of a new Blog Post.

post.description: Clone a blog post, making a copy of it in a new blog post.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the ContentCloneRequest object.

post.description: Restores a blog post to one of its previous versions.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The ID of the version to restore the blog post to.

post.summary: Detach post from a multi-language group
post.description: Detach a blog post from a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content).

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the DetachFromLangGroupRequest object.

post.description: Publish the draft version of the blog post, sending its content to the live page.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the post to publish.

post.summary: Delete a batch of blog posts
post.description:
Delete a blog post by ID. 
Note: This is not the same as the in-app `archive` function. To perform a dashboard `archive` send an normal update with the `archivedInDashboard` field set to `true`.

requestBody.description: The JSON array of Blog Post ids.

post.summary: Reset post draft to the live version
post.description: Discard all drafted content, resetting the draft to contain the content in the currently published version.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to reset.

post.summary: Attach post to a multi-language group
post.description: Attach a blog post to a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content).

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the AttachToLangPrimaryRequest object.

put.description: Set the primary language of a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content) to the language of the provided post (specified as an ID in the request body)

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the SetNewLanguagePrimaryRequest object.

get.description: Retrieve a blog post by the post ID.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted blog posts. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: Specific properties to return.

delete.description: Delete a blog post by ID.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to delete.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been deleted.

patch.description: Partially updates a single blog post by ID. You only need to specify the values that you want to update.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to update.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted blog posts. Defaults to `false`.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the updated Blog Post.

get.summary: Retrieves all previous versions of a post
get.description: Retrieve all the previous versions of a blog post.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve previous versions of.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

BatchInputString.description: Wrapper for providing an array of strings as inputs.

StandardError.description: Model definition for a standard error.

BatchInputJsonNode.description: Wrapper for providing an array of JSON nodes as inputs.

languages.description: Map of object IDs to associated languages of object in the multi-language group.

primaryId.description: ID of the primary object in the multi-language group.

UpdateLanguagesRequestVNext.description: Request object for updating languages within a multi-language group.

total.description: Total number of blog post versions.

CollectionResponseWithTotalVersionBlogPo.description: Response object for collections of blog post versions with pagination information.

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

SetNewLanguagePrimaryRequestVNext.description: Request body object for setting a new primary language.

RGBAColor.description: A color defined by RGB values.

id.description: ID of the object to remove from a multi-language group.

DetachFromLangGroupRequestVNext.description: Request body object for detaching objects from multi-language groups.

language.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

id.description: ID of the object to add to a multi-language group.

primaryId.description: ID of primary language object in multi-language group.

primaryLanguage.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.

AttachToLangPrimaryRequestVNext.description: Request body object for attaching objects to multi-language groups.

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

BatchInputBlogPost.description: Wrapper for providing an array of blog posts as inputs.

id.description: ID of blog post to clone.

BlogPostLanguageCloneRequestVNext.description: Request body object for creating new blog post language variant.

fullName.description: The first and last name of the User.

id.description: The unique ID of the User.

email.description: The email address of the user.

VersionUser.description: Model definition for a version user. Contains addition information about the user who created a version.

BatchResponseBlogPostWithErrors.description: Response object for batch operations on blog posts with errors.

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate
message.example: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

VersionBlogPost.description: Model definition of a version of a blog post.

publishDate.description: The date (ISO8601 format) the blog post is to be published at.

language.description: The explicitly defined ISO 639 language code of the Blog Post. If null, the Blog Post will default to the language of the ParentBlog.

enableLayoutStylesheets.description: Boolean to determine whether or not the styles from the template should be applied.

metaDescription.description: A description that goes in <meta> tag on the page.

attachedStylesheets.description: List of stylesheets to attach to this blog post. These stylesheets are attached to just this page. Order of precedence is bottom to top, just like in the HTML.

password.description: Set this to create a password protected page. Entering the password will be required to view the page.

htmlTitle.description: The html title of this Blog Post.

publishImmediately.description: Set this to true if you want to be published immediately when the schedule publish endpoint is called, and to ignore the publish_date setting.

id.description: The unique ID of the Blog Post.

state.description: An ENUM descibing the current state of this Blog Post.

slug.description: The path of the this blog post. This field is appended to the domain to construct the url of this post.

createdById.description: The ID of the user that created this Blog Post.

rssBody.description: The contents of the RSS body for this Blog Post.

archivedInDashboard.description: If True, the post will not show up in your dashboard, although the post could still be live.

contentTypeCategory.description: An ENUM descibing the type of this object. Should always be BLOG_POST.

updatedById.description: The ID of the user that updated this Blog Post.

translatedFromId.description: ID of the primary blog post this object was translated from.

widgetContainers.description: A data structure containing the data for all the modules inside the containers for this post. This will only be populated if the page has widget containers.

featuredImage.description: The featuredImage of this Blog Post.

authorName.description: The name of the user that updated this Blog Post.

domain.description: The domain this Blog Post will resolve to. If null, the Blog Post will default to the domain of the ParentBlog.

name.description: The internal name of the Blog Post.

dynamicPageHubDbTableId.description: The ID of the HubDB table this Blog Post references, if applicable

campaign.description: The GUID of the marketing campaign this Blog Post is a part of.

enableDomainStylesheets.description: Boolean to determine whether or not the styles from the template should be applied.

includeDefaultCustomCss.description: Boolean to determine whether or not the Primary CSS Files should be applied.

footerHtml.description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript that should be placed before the </body> tag of the page.

tagIds.description: List of IDs for the tags associated with this Blog Post.

widgets.description: A data structure containing the data for all the modules for this page.

postSummary.description: The summary of the blog post that will appear on the main listing page.

headHtml.description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript, etc. that goes in the <head> tag of the page.

useFeaturedImage.description: Boolean to determine if this post should use a featuredImage.

blogAuthorId.description: The ID of the Blog Author associated with this Blog Post.

contentGroupId.description: The ID of the parent Blog this Blog Post is associated with.

rssSummary.description: The contents of the RSS summary for this Blog Post.

url.description: A generated field representing the URL of this blog post.

enableGoogleAmpOutputOverride.description: Boolean to allow overriding the AMP settings for the blog.

publicAccessRules.description: Rules for require member registration to access private content.

archivedAt.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this Blog Post was deleted.

postBody.description: The HTML of the main post body.

publicAccessRulesEnabled.description: Boolean to determine whether or not to respect publicAccessRules.

currentState.description: A generated ENUM descibing the current state of this Blog Post. Should always match state.

categoryId.description: ID of the type of object this is.

linkRelCanonicalUrl.description: Optional override to set the URL to be used in the rel=canonical link tag on the page.

BlogPost.description: Model definition for a Blog Post.

BatchResponseBlogPost.description: Response object for batch operations on blog posts.

CollectionResponseWithTotalBlogPostForwa.description: Response object for collections of blog posts with pagination information.

PreviousPage.description: Model definition for a previous page

publishDate.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

id.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

ContentScheduleRequestVNext.description: Request body object for scheduling the publish of content

id.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

ContentCloneRequestVNext.description: Request body object for cloning content.

NextPage.description: Model definition for a next page.

scopes.content: Read from and write to my Content
